issue.title: self_collide should be a model property, not a link property

content.raw:
I originally implemented this to mark a single link within a model to collide with others.

I think we need better collision management, one that specifies which link collides with with link within a model on a more systematic basis.  That said, I don't have a good proposal right now, one would be welcome!
content.html:
I originally implemented this to mark a single link within a model to collide with others.

I think we need better collision management, one that specifies which link collides with with link within a model on a more systematic basis. That said, I don't have a good proposal right now, one would be welcome!
